name: Who let the dogs out?
description:
"Who Let The Dogs Out" a story driven point & click adventure game which is fully voiced. You play the detective trying to solve the mystery that took place at the farm. 

Interrogate the suspects and search the crime scene with your magnifying glass in order to find clues which will help you unravel the mystery.  When you think you have a good idea who the suspect is, use the stamp tool on the document to mark the culprit!

Can you make the connections necessary in order to find the culprit?
